query:
SELECT COUNT(*) as count, source, gender_id, contact_type as type, DATE(created_date) as created_date from civicrm_contact as contact 
JOIN civicrm_group_contact gc ON contact.id = gc.contact_id AND gc.group_id = %1 AND gc.status = 'Added' 
where is_deleted=0 
  AND is_opt_out=0
  AND created_date is not null
join civicrm_email email on e.contact_id=contact.id
where email.is_primary IS true  
 and email.on_hold =0 
group by DATE(created_date), contact_type, gender_id, source;
